resources.string: Please adjust the angle of the headset so that you can see the full screen
You can also use the slider to change the display distance
Moverio BT-45C smart glass front view
In this initial step please take the BT-350 headset and place it flat on a table in front of you. If you do not have a BT-350 model then please download the BT-350 Isometric image

This device has two viewing modes 
 Mirror Mode and Trackpad mode. 

 You can switch between these modes by pressing the Switch key twice on the left of the device.
Please make sure the Moverio Headset is connected
Please make sure the Moverio is in Trackpad Mode
Scan your business card to be sent brochure
Test the latest Epson Moverio smart with this AR demonstration app that can detect real world objects and overlay content
You should be able to see the number boxes in all four corners
What would you like to learn ? Robots or the BT-40 Optical Engine
Press the button for the activity you would like to test
Choose the best option to discover the Moverio smart glass
Great, you have a print out of either the BT-40 or BT-45CS ?
Which product would you like to discover ?
I have a printout of a BT-40 or BT-45C
I physical have another BT-40 or BT-45C
I do not have a BT-40 or BT-45C smart glass
Camera open fails. Please check camera permission is allowed
EPSON has been manufacturing smart glasses under the brand MOVERIO for over 10 years
Ideal for Remote Assistance and Digital Workflow
You have reached the end of this experience
Enhance your visitor experience by offering an immersive virtual guide to complement your visit.
Improve accessibility to theaters and cinemas for individuals who are hard of hearing or for audiences who speak non-native languages.
Thanks to the USB-C standard, you can connect to your laptop or compatible smartphone, providing an immersive second-screen experience.
You have either an actual BT-40 or BT-45C in front of you ? Perfect
Look at the image so it is visible in the camera and wait for AR content to be displayed.
